text: hey what's up guys this is Justin Bieber
here I just wanted to tell everybody my
world 2.0 is in stores on iTunes and
everywhere so um I just wanted to say
thank you to everybody for all the
support you guys have been you know
amazing and thanks for all the support

is in the album basically get the chance
to come on vacation with me and watch my

sure to go get the album my world 2.0 in
